# Naia Lab

> Your Personal AI Desktop OS — Where Technology meets Emotion

Naia Lab (naia.nextain.io) is the service portal for Naia OS, a personal AI desktop operating system.

## What is Naia OS?

Naia OS is a desktop application (and a standalone Linux OS) featuring:
- **3D AI Avatar**: A fully animated 3D character named Alpha that lives on your desktop
- **Voice Conversations**: Real-time voice chat with AI using text-to-speech and speech-to-text
- **Multi-LLM Support**: Connect to Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, xAI Grok, and more
- **Agent System**: AI agents that can browse the web, manage files, and execute tasks
- **Channel System**: Organized conversation channels for different topics

## What does Naia Lab provide?

The Lab portal (this site) provides:
- **Account Management**: OAuth sign-in via Google and Discord
- **API Credit System**: Purchase and manage credits for LLM API usage
- **Usage Dashboard**: Monitor your AI usage with charts and detailed logs
- **API Key Management**: Create and manage API keys for desktop app connection
- **Desktop Integration**: Seamless connection between the web portal and desktop app

## Public Pages

- `/en` or `/ko` — Homepage (features, pricing, FAQ)
- `/en/manual` or `/ko/manual` — User manual (14 sections)
- `/en/terms` — Terms of Service
- `/en/privacy` — Privacy Policy
- `/en/refund` — Refund Policy
- `/en/contact` — Contact

## Technology

- Built with Next.js (App Router), deployed on Vercel
- Backend: any-llm gateway (FastAPI) for LLM proxy and credit management
- Desktop app: Tauri 2 + React + Node.js agent
- Languages: English and Korean (i18n)

## Company

Naia is developed by Nextain, a South Korean AI company.
- Website: https://naia.nextain.io
- Parent: https://nextain.io
